Two Dementia

2002-05-01

00:06:34
Stream from Google Video: Two Dementia (Flash)
Download from archive.org: Two_Dementia.divx.avi (58 MB 640x480 DivX)

Live action (digital video) and 2D computer animation. Starring Matthew Edison, Sara Culp, Aisling Doyle, and featuring a special celebrity cameo. Created by me, produced by UNC STV.
This short film fit into a larger narrative about a fortune teller (that might or might not have ever been finished). In my sequence, she strands her boyfriend in another dimension. Why not?
